Class MenuViewController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.viewModel.ModelObserver
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.view.gui.guiControllers.MenuViewController
public class MenuViewController extends ModelObserver
The controller for the Menu view Uses ModelObserver to be updated with the ViewModelState
